activities.loc: Richland County Courtroom, Floor C, Courthouse

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Abbigail R Hartner

defendant.name: Hartner, Abbigail R
defendant.address: E3055 Phylane Rd., Lone Rock, WI 53556

records.addlTxt:
1:12 PM Defendant Abbigail R Hartner in court, in custody.  Attorney Mark Walter Frank in court for Abbigail R Hartner.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. Court speaks about AH nonappearances. State asks that the warrant be quashed and reinstate the bond. Court quashes the warrant and reinstated the bond.

Court asks about AB address. Attorney Frank waives the formal reading and waives the time limits of the preliminary hearing.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for December 5, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Preliminary hearing on December 5, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Return on warrant/Initial appearance on October 13, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
From RCSD RE: In Custody Richland County Jail

2:00 PM Defendant Abbigail R Hartner not in court.  Attorney Mark Walter Frank in court for Abbigail R Hartner.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Frank hasn't heard from AH. Attorney Harper asks that the stay be lifted. Court orders a warrant.

1:08 PM Defendant Abbigail R Hartner not in court.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Frank appears in person. Attorney Frank has represented AH in prior cases by appointment of PDO. Attorney Frank will be accepting this appointment from the public defenders office. 

AH has called the Attorney Frank office stating that she is unable to make her hearing today due to lack of transportation. Attorney Harper ask for a warrant. Attorney Frank heard and asks for another hearing. Court authorizes a warrant but stayed.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on August 17, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

4:30 PM Defendant Abbigal Hartner in court, in custody. Attorney Harper appears in person. Attorney Erickson appears by zoom and notes Attorney Bartelt will be taking this case.
Attorney Harper asks for a $5,000 signature bond with a no contact with 510 S Cairns Ave, Richland Center, WI 
No objection
Court orders:
$5,000 Signature Bond
Not to be on the premises of 510 S Cairns Ave, Richland Center, WI and to have a no contact with that residence.

Initial set for 08/11/22 at 1 PM
